# abstract
here, i re-examine the analysis of oeppen and vaupel (2002).

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
data(gapminder_unfiltered)
```

set the data
```{r}
gapminder_unfiltered%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp))%>%
  ungroup()%>%
  select(year,country,lifeExp)%>%
  arrange(year) ->
  sumdat
```
